issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Improve performance of the parquet compressors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10931](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10931). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As part of moving to stable Rust (ARROW-10636), we lost some amount of performance in the parquet compressors. The improvement to stable rust was deemed worthwhile but `[~gbowyer]` thinks there is additional changes could be made to improve the compressors.

More detail can be found here;
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8698#issuecomment-740958408
